com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain
Class PPError<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain.PPError<T>
Type Parameters:
T - They type of the error. In the simplest usage it could be BasicErrors. However, some APIs will define a more detailed (and domain specific) error type such as 'PaymentErrors' or 'CardReaderErrors'.
public class PPError<T>
extends Object

A base class for errors from the PayPalHere system. These are typed. For example, some APIs might return errors related to payments. Those will be PPError. Other APIs might return errors related to payment cards. Those will be PPError You can reliably switch on the error codes. The type enums will narrowly define the kinds of errors you can receive from a certain call. The detailed messages is for informative purposes however. It should not be parsed in code as the detailed message is subject to change.

Nested Class Summary
static class PPError.BasicErrors
          The simplest type of PPError the API might return.

getErrorCode

public T getErrorCode()
Returns an error code describing the error.

Returns:
The error code from the enum type. For example, if this is a PPError object then this method might return 'BasicErrors.Unknown'
